quote: Think and wonder, wonder and think. – Dr. Seuss
fact: William Marston engineered one of the earliest forms of the polygraph in the early 1900`s. Later he went on to create the comic strip Wonder Woman, a story about a displaced Amazon princess who forces anyone caught in her magic lasso to tell the truth
joke: The shovel was a ground-breaking invention.
